title: Loading screen problem?
body: So my game for some reason wouldn`t load after all players have loaded. I hear the sound of champions spawning and it just crashes. So I exited League ASAP to reopen the client. the client then tells me somethings wrong and to reopen the League of Legends client. I do so, only to come across a notice that they reverted me to a previous patch. Now that i`m able to log in I get a notice that I`ve been hunted down by the Leaverbuster. I`m wondering if there were any other cases of this happening or was it just me? Kind of sucks because i haven't left a game in forever and now because of this B.S i am required to wait 20 minutes in queue. RITO PLZ

replies.body: This can happen when you've successfully connected to the game server, but some driver or hardware issue is failing to render the game.  This is why you can hear sounds, but not see anything!  My suggestion here would be to go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions or run into issues.
